data.title: Base Stations
data.text:
Maryland's designated EMS Base Stations provide quality on-line medical direction to the Stateâ€™s EMS clinicians. The following information comprises a toolbox for EMS Base Station staff to sustain and improve the quality of their programs.

Location: UMMS Upper Chesapeake Health Aberdeen

Room: Aberdeen Conference Room 2

Date: September 12, 2024

Time: 10 AM to 1 PM

POC: *Please register by emailing Kat Woodford, Education Specialist at (kwoodford1@umm.edu).

Location: Baltimore Washington Medical Center

Date: September 23, 2024

Time: 11 AM

POC: Miranda Hartman RN, Clinical Nurse II - BWMC Base Station Coordinator, BWMC Emergency Department (miranda.hartman@umm.edu).

Room: Upper Chesapeake Medical Center Computer Lab

Date: December 12, 2024
